docs.summary: The results of a bookingsRc query, containing the retrieved items.
description: When you execute a query with the [`find()`](wix-bookings-rc-backend.BookingsRcQueryBuilder.html#find)
function, it returns a Promise that resolves to a `BookingsRcQueryResult` object.
This object contains the items that match the query, information about the
query itself, and functions for paging through the query results.

docs.summary: Returns the index of the current results page number.
description: The `currentPage` is a zero-based index of the current page of results.
The page size is defined by the [`limit()`](wix-bookings-rc-backend.BookingsRcQueryBuilder.html#limit)
function, can be retrieved using the [`pageSize`](#pageSize) property, and
navigating through pages is done with the [`prev()`](#prev) and
[`next()`](#next) functions.
The `currentPage` property returns `undefined` if the query returned no results.

docs.summary: Returns the items that match the query.
description: The current page of items retrieved by the query.
Slots on the calendar.
> **Note:** When no items match the query, the items array is empty.
To paginate your query results, use the `BookingsRcQueryResult` pagination properties and functions.

docs.summary: Returns the number of items in the current results page.
description: The page size is defined by the [`limit()`](wix-bookings-rc-backend.BookingsRcQueryBuilder.html#limit)
function, can be retrieved using the [`pageSize`](#pageSize) property, and
navigating through pages is done with the [`prev()`](#prev) and
[`next()`](#next) functions.
The page size is defined by the [`limit()`](wix-bookings-rc-backend.BookingsRcQueryBuilder.html#limit)
function, can be retrieved using the [`pageSize`](#pageSize) property, and
navigating through pages is done with the [`prev()`](#prev) and
[`next()`](#next) functions.

docs.summary: Contains functionality for refining a bookingsRc query.
description: The `BookingsRcQueryBuilder` functions enable you to run, sort, filter, and control
which results a query returns.
Typically, you build a query using any of the bookingsRc query functions,
refine the query by chaining `BookingsRcQueryBuilder` functions, and then execute the
query by chaining the [`find()`](#find) function.
For example, the following code queries...:
```javascript
import wixBookingsRcBackend from 'wix-bookingsRc-backend';
wixBookingsRcBackend.queryBookingsRc()
.eq("<property1>", "<value1>")
.ascending("<property2>")
.limit(5)
.find()
.then( (results) => {
console.log(results.items);

docs.summary: Returns the total number of items that match the query.
description: The `totalCount` returns the total number of items that match the query,
not just the number of items in the current page.

docs.summary: Returns the total number of pages the query produced.
description: The page size is defined by the [`limit()`](wix-bookings-rc-backend.BookingsRcQueryBuilder.html#limit)
function, can be retrieved using the [`pageSize`](#pageSize) property, and
navigating through pages is done with the [`prev()`](#prev) and
[`next()`](#next) functions.

docs.summary: Indicates if the query has more results.
Indicates if the query has previous results.
